channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OAK-5328] Fix the errors reported by the Javadoc tool in JDK8
item.description:
Some Javadoc is not strict enough according to the Javadoc tool shipped in JDK8:

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-javadoc-plugin:2.9:javadoc (default-cli) on project oak-core: An error has occurred in JavaDocs report generation:
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\blob\AbstractSharedCachingDataStore.java:66: error: bad use of '>'
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\blob\AbstractSharedCachingDataStore.java:68: error: bad use of '>'

[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\blob\AbstractSharedCachingDataStore.java:74: error: bad use of '>'
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\blob\AbstractSharedCachingDataStore.java:65: error: element not closed: pre
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\blob\UploadStagingCache.java:465: error: reference not found
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\document\AbstractDocumentNodeState.java:50: error: reference not found
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\document\AbstractDocumentNodeState.java:52: error: reference not found

item.summary: Fix the errors reported by the Javadoc tool in JDK8

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Committed fix for org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.blob classed with http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1774996&view=rev

Three errors left:

[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\document\AbstractDocumentNodeState.java:50: error: reference not found
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\document\AbstractDocumentNodeState.java:52: error: reference not found
[ERROR] C:\projects\apache\oak\trunk\oak-core\src\main\java\org\apache\jackrabbit\oak\plugins\document\AbstractDocumentNodeState.java:56: error: reference not found

mreutegg - could you have a look?
Fixed AbstractDocumentNodeState in trunk: http://svn.apache.org/r1777997

FWIW, the problem below remains:

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-javadoc-plugin:2.9:javadoc (default-cli) on project oak-upgrade: An error has occurred in JavaDocs report generation:
[ERROR] Exit code: 1 - warning: unknown enum constant ConfigurationPolicy.REQUIRE
[ERROR] reason: class file for org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.ConfigurationPolicy not found
[ERROR] warning: unknown enum constant ConfigurationPolicy.REQUIRE
[ERROR] warning: unknown enum constant ConfigurationPolicy.REQUIRE
[ERROR] javadoc: error - com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.util.DocletAbortException: com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$CompletionFailure: class file for org.apache.jackrabbit.test.RepositoryStub not found

Fixed one remaining error in DataStoreCheckCommand (oak-run): http://svn.apache.org/r1778089

reschke, what maven goal do you execute? I'm not able to reproduce with mvn javadoc:javadoc.

That's what I was doing (after setting JAVA_HOME to JDK8).

I now have updated from 8u60 to 8u111, and the problem is gone.
trunk: r1778089 r1778003 r1777997 r1777799 r1777797 r1774996
